name: Dungeonman (itch)
description:
It is a game about an old wizard who is seeking a treasure. Help him to collect piles of gold, pouches of gold, magic scrolls and treasure chests.
Beware! Many monsters want to stop you. Dungeons are full of magic portals through which many type of skeletons and demons enter to this realm.

* 9 levels (many to come soon)
* 3 type of weapons
* 8 monsters
* Many random events
* Game statistics
* Continuing game after quitting at the same level
* 3 musics themes
* ... and some puzzles

The game can be found also on:

Windows 8 Store

See our web site for more products:

Rozen Software

Note: the free version includes ads.
